testcase.classname: feature to Verify //www.saucedemo.com/ login functionality login with username and password
testcase.name: 2 Failed Login with LockedOutUser

failure.message: expected:<[Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out].> but was:<[Sorry, this user has been banned].>

testcase.failure:
